input_text:
Job Title: Sales Development Representative II

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Location: Work is what you do, not where you go. For this role, we are open to remote work and can hire anywhere in the United States or Canada

About The Opportunity

We are seeking a motivated and dynamic Sales Development Representative to join our growing team. As a Sales Development Representative, you will play a crucial role in driving our company's growth by managing inbound inquiries, qualifying leads, and contributing to pipeline creation. Your primary focus will be monitoring and responding to inbound leads, initiating contact, and nurturing relationships to ultimately convert leads into qualified opportunities for our sales team.

What Youâ€™ll Get To Do

Inbound Lead Management:

Monitor and manage incoming leads from various sources, including phone and website inquiries, marketing campaigns, and events.Respond promptly and according to SLAs to inbound leads, gathering initial information and assessing their potential fit as opportunities for our sales team. Schedule high-quality, BANT qualified meetings (SQLs) for Account Executives.

Account Enrichment

Research and gather relevant information about leads and prospects to enhance data quality in our CRM system.Update and maintain accurate contact details, company information, and other pertinent data in Salesforce.Utilize online resources and tools to gather insights and intelligence on target companies and their key decision-makers.

Salesforce Updates

Ensure accurate and timely updates of lead interactions, account activities, and notes in Salesforce.Regularly review and cleanse data to maintain database hygiene and accuracy.Maintain accurate records of lead interactions, outreach efforts, and progress in generating qualified leads.Provide regular reports on key performance metrics, including lead conversion rates. 

Skills And Experience We Value

1-2 years related experience required. Previous phone sales/appointment setting experience.Familiarity with Salesforce or other CRM platforms. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport and establish relationships.Detail-oriented and proficient in data entry and maintaining accurate records.Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently.Comfortable with making outbound phone calls and engaging in outbound prospecting activities.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Sales Development Representative II
output_json.summary: Motivated and dynamic Sales Development Representative needed to drive company growth by managing inbound inquiries, qualifying leads, and contributing to pipeline creation.
soft_skills: Comfortable with making outbound phone calls
job_responsibilities: Schedule high-quality meetings for Account Executives
Research and gather information about leads and prospects
Maintain accurate contact details in Salesforce
Provide regular reports on key performance metrics
